(Barkley and Karpinski 2014) According to Eden Strategy Institute, The Filipino says that they would rather lose their personal need than lose their internet access or their gadgets, This shows that kids nowadays or our generation nowadays are more connected on their gadgets than helping their family in the house chores or exercising, and this also shows that they can sacrifice their health for the internet access and their gadgets, it ends up like an addiction where kids can not control it anymore. Base in our research people in Davao are more on the better-quality gadgets.
